meanings.definition: A Japanese martial art involving punches, kicks, and open-handed strikes.
meanings.sent1: She learned karates from a skilled instructor.
meanings.sent2: Many children enjoy practicing karates after school.
meanings.sent3: The karates class had everyone laughing as they tried new moves.
meanings.sent4: His determination in karates was like a roaring lion in battle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of karates echoed through the dojo, filling it with energy.

meanings.definition: The practice or study of karate.
meanings.sent1: Karates requires discipline and focus to master.
meanings.sent2: After work, she heads to the gym for her karates session.
meanings.sent3: His dedication to karates was evident in his daily training routine.
meanings.sent4: In the world of karates, every move is a step towards perfection.
meanings.sent5: The sensei's passion for karates inspired all his students to excel.

meanings.sent1: The karates showed great skill in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: She admired the dedication of the karates in her class.
meanings.sent3: The karates greeted each other with a bow before training.
meanings.sent4: Among the karates, he was known for his speed and agility.
meanings.sent5: The young karates looked up to the experienced black belts for guidance.
